channel.title: Client Cant Connect
channel.description:
I have a 317 server and Hamachi(eww, I know, but I cant portforward), the Hamchi is set up and works fine, but a friend who I gave the client to cant connect to my server. Is there something in the client or server code that I have to set to my IP in order for their client to go through Hamachi to get to my server or something like that? Note, the server and client work fine for me. If it helps, I'm using EvolutionX as my base.
I would use a silab/mopar server since they have a special webclient that can connect to any server, but it looks so ugly! I have acctually downloaded a silab server and used the MoparScape webclient to connect to it and it works fine, but I dont like how ugly it looks. Is there a webclient with a more modern rs hud(like EvolutionX for example) that can connect to any server?

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @Jinseru Jinseru
item.description:
@Jinseru wrote:

ok, so where do i find it to see if it was changed?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Of course it can be changed. 43594 is just the one most people use. Besides that people use 43595 and 5555.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @Jinseru Jinseru
item.description:
@Jinseru wrote:

Wow, i didnt see these replies… which are all preatty much flaming now… Originally this was a server question. I asked how to change the SERVER IP, THEN i realized it in the client based on the answers i got. Anyway, on topic plz:

A friend of mine is willing to port forward for me, but he needs to know what the port is. I have no idea how to find it… Do ALL private servers use 43594 or can it be changed? Where can i find what port my client uses?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

Jinseru:

Well, i was going to post up my gui.java, but it says i cant because exceeds the character limit of 20,000 characters (wow!) But, you already told me to do this, but as i was looking at it after i pasted, i found this: “ServerIp = 120.0.0.1” ill try changing this to my ip, i really did not see this at first, probably because its near the top…

Yes that is what you need to change! now put it to your hamachi ip, compile, and send the client again to the player(s).

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @Jinseru Jinseru
item.description:
@Jinseru wrote:

I dont have an EGUI file, but i have Gui.java and there wasnt anything that set the ip directly, like a string or something. Client.java doesnt have it either… I saw what you where talking about in Gui.java, the bottom did have ip stuff, but no such ip string or anything…
If it helps, I think ive said this tho, but, Im using EvolutionX by Reality as the base…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cant Connect
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Jinseru, post:6, topic:334008”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=430402.msg3160252#msg3160252 date=1269473462]
The client.
[/quote]
The client… ok, but WHERE in the client is it? what file? what do i search for? Specifics please…

Okay the reason hamachi suxs is because the people playing ALSO have to download it and join your network…
and i can help you port forward through team viewer. =)

The reason im using hamachi i because I CANT portforward… And yes, the person im testing it with has hamachi

Still need help here…[/quote]

Either in EGUI, or client.java of the Client. Should be at the bottom of the main method.

Read full topic
